name: Add Google Sheets rows for new CallTrackingMetrics calls
description: Every time a new call in CallTrackingMetrics appears, Make will automatically add a Google Sheets row. Here's the [sheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1gkQeO9_J3jW_rbboc-ysrFgjl_F37vqy2cafR4JoHg0/edit?usp=sharing) used in this scenario.
